sqlMap.select: SELECT A.schl_cl_cd AS cl_cd ,B.sub_nm AS cl_nm ,A.tch_div_cd AS div_cd ,C.nm AS div_nm FROM tb_teacher A JOIN tb_school B ON A.schl_cd = B.cd AND A.schl_cl_cd = B.sub_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_common C ON A.tch_div_cd = C.cd WHERE 1=1 AND A.id = #id# AND A.schl_cd = #school_cd# AND A.us_yn = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cplan_yr WHERE 1=1 AND schl_cd = #searchSchlCode# AND stnd_yr = #searchYr#

SELECT CONCAT(stnd_yr,'||',stnd_mn,'||',stnd_wk,'||',schl_cl_cd) AS seqNo ,CONCAT(stnd_yr,'년도 ',stnd_mn,'월 ',stnd_wk,'주차 연간보육 계획안') as title ,CONCAT(SUBSTRING(main_evnt,1,10), '...') AS contents ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y.%m.%d') AS regDt ,reg_id AS regId ,DATE_FORMAT(mod_dt, '%Y.%m.%d') AS modDt ,mod_id AS modId FROM tb_cplan_yr WHERE 1=1 AND schl_cd = #searchSchlCode# AND stnd_yr = #searchYr# ORDER BY stnd_yr, stnd_mn, stnd_wk DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cplan_yr WHERE 1=1 AND schl_cd = #school_code# AND schl_cl_cd = #class_code# AND stnd_yr = #year# AND stnd_mn = #month# AND stnd_wk = #week#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cplan_yr ( idx ,schl_cd ,schl_cl_cd ,stnd_yr ,stnd_mn ,stnd_wk ,main_evnt ,main_exp ,reg_dt ,reg_id ,mod_dt ,mod_id ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(idx)+1, 1) FROM tb_cplan_yr a WHERE a.schl_cd = #school_code# AND a.stnd_yr = #year# AND a.stnd_mn = #month# AND a.stnd_wk = #week# ) ,#school_code# ,#class_code# ,#year# ,#month# ,#week# ,#mainEvent# ,#mainExp# ,NOW() ,#id# ,NOW() ,#id# )
